overview:
Over 3 years of experience in IT staffing/recruiting: full cycle of recruitment,strategic methodologies, contingent and retained search

Specialties Human Resources - Recruitment, Interviewing, Testing of Applicants, New Hire Orientation, Creating Employee Handbook, Disciplinary Actions, Employee Relations, Benefits Administration, Job Postings, Writing of Classified Ads, Maintaining Personnel Files, Employment Verifications, Reference Checking, Job Fairs
